subject: JOBS.md Status Discrepancy Identified
content: DISCREPANCY: coordinator/JOBS.md claims 'PHASES 1-4 COMPLETE - awaiting strategic direction' but PROACTIVE-JOBS.md shows ongoing detailed task work across all phases. Progress files confirm recent active completions (build-fix-media-exports 2026-02-14). JOBS.md appears stale while actual work continues. Requesting guidance on accurate status assessment and whether to update JOBS.md based on progress files evidence.
